sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtcadministcoderecptnlog ( occrrnc_de , administ_zone_se , administ_zone_code , opert_sn , change_se_code , process_se , administ_zone_nm , lowest_administ_zone_nm , ctprvn_code , signgu_code , emd_code , li_code , creat_de , abl_de , abl_ennc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# , #administZoneSe# , #administZoneCode# , #opertSn# , #changeSeCode# , #processSe# , #administZoneNm# , #lowestAdministZoneNm# , #ctprvnCode# , #signguCode# , #emdCode# , #liCode# , #creatDe# , #ablDe# , #ablEnnc# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtcadministcoderecptnlog SET occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# , administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode# , opert_sn = #opertSn# , change_se_code = #changeSeCode# , process_se = #processSe# , administ_zone_nm = #administZoneNm# , lowest_administ_zone_nm = #lowestAdministZoneNm# , ctprvn_code = #ctprvnCode# , signgu_code = #signguCode# , emd_code = #emdCode# , li_code = #liCode# , creat_de = #creatDe# , abl_de = #ablDe# , abl_ennc = #ablEnnc# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# AND administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode# AND opert_sn = #opertSn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtcadministcoderecptnlog WHERE 1 = 1 AND occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# AND administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode# AND opert_sn = #opertSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT occrrnc_de , administ_zone_se , administ_zone_code , opert_sn , change_se_code , process_se , administ_zone_nm , lowest_administ_zone_nm , ctprvn_code , signgu_code , emd_code , li_code , creat_de , abl_de , abl_ennc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTCADMINISTCODERECPTNLOG WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# AND administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode# AND opert_sn = #opertSn#

SELECT A.OCCRRNC_DE , A.ADMINIST_ZONE_SE , A.ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , A.OPERT_SN , A.CHANGE_SE_CODE , A.PROCESS_SE , A.ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , A.LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , A.CTPRVN_CODE , A.SIGNGU_CODE , A.EMD_CODE , A.LI_CODE , A.CREAT_DE , A.ABL_DE , A.ABL_ENNC , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT OCCRRNC_DE , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , OPERT_SN , CHANGE_SE_CODE , PROCESS_SE , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , CTPRVN_CODE , SIGNGU_CODE , EMD_CODE , LI_CODE , CREAT_DE , ABL_DE , ABL_ENNC , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTCADMINISTCODERECPTNLOG WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword#
ADMINIST_ZONE_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY OCCRRNC_DE DESC , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE DESC , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE DESC , OPERT_SN DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTCADMINISTCODERECPTNLOG WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword#
ADMINIST_ZONE_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
